title: Schedule an Annual Policy Review Meeting
description: An agent needs to schedule an annual review with a life insurance client to discuss their policy and any changing needs.

tasks.description: Identify a list of clients due for their annual review this month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs a report and gets a list of clients to contact.

tasks.description: Contact a client to schedule a meeting.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully reaches a client and proposes a meeting.

tasks.description: Schedule the review in the agent's calendar and send a confirmation to the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books the meeting and sends a calendar invite.
